basics.name: Aaron Jenkins
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer in Test with 4 years of experience in HCM Software Industry looking to leverage proven leadership, quality ssurance, and programming skills

highlights: Moved to new team to rewrite legacy applications in .Net Core framework to increase application stability, usability, and scale-ability
Created new Automation framework to run on .Net Core framework
Developed new application for Dev Ops team to check application health in test and production environments
Conducted interviews with potential candidates to determine technical experience
